@(service: akka.grpc.gen.scaladsl.Service, methodsWithParamTyped: Map[String,String], contImpl: String)

// Generated by Play gRPC Gateway. DO NOT EDIT.
package @service.packageName

import scala.concurrent.{ExecutionContext, Future}

import play.api.mvc._
import javax.inject.Inject
import com.typesafe.config.Config

import @{service.packageName}._

@defining(service.name) { serviceName =>

class @{serviceName}Controller @@Inject()(config: Config, impl: @{contImpl})(implicit ec: ExecutionContext) extends InjectedController {
  @for((method, inputParams) <- methodsWithParamTyped) {
    def @{method} (@{inputParams}) = Action.async { implicit req =>
      @if(inputParams.nonEmpty) {
        impl.@{method}(@{inputParams})
      }
      @if(inputParams.isEmpty) {
        impl.@{method}()
      }
    }
  }
}

}
